# Is Cold Email Legal?

URL: https://iscoldemaillegal.com
Description: Yes, cold email is legal in most countries. In the US, CAN-SPAM requires a physical address, opt-out mechanism, and honest subject lines. EU GDPR requires legitimate interest or consent.

## Quick Answer

Yes, cold email is legal in most countries. In the US, CAN-SPAM requires a physical address, opt-out mechanism, and honest subject lines. EU GDPR requires legitimate interest or consent.
